channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Maryland is the first state to sign into new federal health care program
item.description: Maryland is the first state to sign an agreement with the federal government designed to improve health care and lower costs.

item.title: Early in-person voting in North Carolina exceeds 2020 total
item.description: Early in-person voting in North Carolina ends Saturday, but the number of people who’ve cast ballots by this method already has exceeded the total from four years ago.

item.title: Court confirms federal takeover of a Mississippi jail but limits power over budget
item.description: An appeals court says a federal receiver can proceed with a takeover of a Mississippi jail where a judge found unconstitutional conditions and “a stunning array of assaults, as well as deaths.”
